name: A FRIEND IN THE SCIENCE DEPARTMENT

system.description:
University Hub Move

When you hit the streets to look for information about strange/magical phenomena via university contacts, roll with Mind instead of Circle when consulting university contacts.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: Questions attract attention of old enemy looking to settle a score.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, they're available and have the stuff. On a 7-9, choose 1:

  • whoever you're going to is juggling their own problems
  • whatever you need is more costly than anticipated

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, they're available and have the stuff.
